Test Name: Cocaine and Metabolites Analysis, Umbilical Cord
Purpose: To detect and quantify cocaine and its primary metabolites in umbilical cord tissue for accurate, reliable, and timely clinical reporting.
Container: Labeled microcentrifuge tube or sample vial
Equipment: Liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry (LC-MS/MS) system, sample homogenizer, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, analytical balance, pipettes
